Verses: 1  Karththaave, En Dhooraththil Nirkireer? Aabaththu Neridugira Samayangalil Neer En Maraindhirukkireer?
2 dhunmaarkkan Than Perumaiyinaal Sirumaippattavanaik Kodooramaaith Thunbappaduththugiraan; Avargal Ninaiththa Sadhimosangalil Avargale Agappaduvaargal.
3 dhunmaarkkan Than Ullam Ichchiththadhaip Petradhinaal Perumaipaaraatti, Porulai Abagariththuth Thannaiththaan Potri, Karththarai Asattaipannugiraan.
4 dhunmaarkkan Than Garvaththinaal Dhevanaith Thedaan; Avan Ninaivugalellaam Dhevan Illaiyenpadhe.
5 avan Vazhigal Eppodhum Kedullavaigal; Ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugal Avan Paarvaikku Ettaamal Migavum Uyaramaayirukkiradhu; Than Edhiraaligalellaarmelum Seerugiraan.
6 naan Asaikkappaduvadhillai, Thalaimurai Thalaimuraidhorum Theengu Ennai Anuguvadhillaiyendru Than Irudhayaththil Sollikkollugiraan.
7 avan Vaai Sabippinaalum Kabadaththinaalum Kodumaiyinaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu; Avan Naavinkeezh Theevinaiyum Akkiramamum Undu.
8 giraamangalin Olippidangalile Padhivirundhu, Maraividangalile Kutramatravanaik Kollugiraan; Thikkatravargalaip Pidikka Avan Kangal Nokkikkondirukkiradhu.
9 than Kebiyilirukkira Singaththaippola Maraivil Padhivirukkiraan; Ezhaiyaip Pidikkap Padhivirundhu, Ezhaiyaith Than Valaikkul Izhuththup Pidiththukkollugiraan.
10 thikkatravargal Than Balavaangal Kaiyil Vizhumpadi Avan Padhungikkidakkiraan.
11 dhevan Adhai Marandhaar Endrum, Avar Thammudaiya Mugaththai Maraiththu, Orukkaalum Adhaik Kaanamaattaar Endrum, Than Irudhayaththile Sollikkollugiraan.
12 karththaave, Ezhundharulum; Dhevane, Ummudaiya Kaiyai Uyarththum; Ezhaigalai Maravaadheyum.
13 dhunmaarkkan Dhevanai Asattaipanni: Neer Kettu Visaarippadhillai Endru Than Irudhayaththil Sollikkolvaanen.
14 adhaip Paarththirukkireere! Ubaththiravaththaiyum Kurodhaththaiyum Gavaniththirukkireere; Neer Pathilalippeer; Ezhaiyaanavan Thannai Umakku Oppuvikkiraan; Thikkatra Pillaigalukku Sagaayar Neere.
15 dhunmaarkkanum Pollaadhavanumaayirukkiravanudaiya Puyaththai Muriththuvidum; Avanudaiya Aagaamiyam Kaanaamarpogumattum Adhaith Thedi Visaariyum.
16 karththar Sadhaakaalangalukkum Raajaavaayirukkiraar; Purajaadhiyaar Avarudaiya Dhesaththilirundhu Azhindhupovaargal.
17 karththaave, Sirumaippattavargaludaiya Vendudhalaik Kettirukkireer; Avargal Irudhayaththai Sthirappaduththuveer.
18 mannaana Manushan Inip Balavandhanseyyath Thodaraadhapadikku, Dhevareer Thikkatra Pillaigalukkum Odukkappattavargalukkum Needhiseyya Ummudaiya Sevigalai Saaiththukkettaruluveer.
